page.title: 02HIGH STEAD FARM
page.content: Highstead farm belongs to the N.C.B but is rented by Mr Buglass.The farm consists of a total of 300 acres of which 60 acres are used for pasture and rough grazing,the remaining 240 acres are used for arable farming.The livestock owned by the farm is 25 cows 50 calves 19 fattened stock. There is only one farm labourer employed on the farm.However there is a lot of machinery which includes 3 tractors, 1 combine harvester, 1 bailer,1 grass cutter,1 cultivater,a seed drill and a fertilizer spreader.There are 10 animal sheds,2 cottages and a farm house.Other buildings on the site include a corn store shed and a corn drying shed.
